alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 23 at 3:44PM MDT until March 25 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches possible, with up to 18 inches at higher elevations. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, including over Teton and Togwotee Passes. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Stay tuned for updates. For the latest forecast on the web, go to weather.gov/riverton.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
